text: Brett DiBiase (born March 16, 1988) is an American professional wrestler. He currently has a contract with World Wrestling Entertainment. He wrestles in their farm team in Florida Championship Wrestling, where he gains experience before going national. He was a FCW Florida Tag Team Championship. ==Personal life== DiBiase's stepgrandfather Michael DiBiase, his grandmother Helen Hild, and his father Ted DiBiase were professional wrestlers. His older half brother Mike DiBiase II and his older brother Ted DiBiase, Jr. are also professional wrestlers. On March 27, 2010, DiBiase and his brother Ted Jr. induct their father into the WWE Hall of Fame. On June 9, 2009, DiBiase married his high school sweetheart Leah Nicole May. ==References== == Other websites == * Florida Championship Wrestling profile * Online World of Wrestling profile Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling referees Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi
title: Brett DiBiase
